name: YoCrypto
0:
”Alexa open Yo Crypto”
”Alexa ask Yo Crypto what's the current price of Bitcoin”
”Alexa ask Yo Crypto how many Litecoin I can get for 1000 dollars”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yo crypto
des: With Yo Crypto enabled, you can ask Alexa for information about the value of popular cryptocurrencies such as Litecoin or Bitcoin. You can ask for the current value of one of the included cryptocurrencies as well as how many of a cryptocurrency you can get for a specific amount of dollars. Currently included cryptocurrencies are Bitcoin, Litecoin and Ethereum.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
